items.badge_description: Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 15 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 4.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 80 distinct venues!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 105 distinct venues!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 450 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 20 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 5.
So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.
